p.key: This editor allows you to find useful Craymel Configurations by showing all available Greater Craymels and spells, and which craymel mage they would end up with.

html.p: This editor allows you to find useful Craymel Configurations by showing all available Greater Craymels and spells, and which craymel mage they would end up with.

p.key: Leave one whitespace between each transcription (e.g. a b c d):

html.p: Leave one whitespace between each transcription (e.g. "a b c d") :

p.key: Click on a Greater Craymels name to have him switch to the other craymel mage. The list will update accordingly.

html.p: Click on a Greater Craymel's name to have him switch to the other craymel mage. The list will update accordingly.

p.key: Click on a Greater Craymels name and drag it to another Craymel Cage, then drop it. The list will update accordingly.

html.p: Click on a Greater Craymel's name and drag it to another Craymel Cage, then drop it. The list will update accordingly.
